title: One Piece Episode 290 - IMDb
author: Various reviewers
description: IMDb page for Episode 290 featuring an 8.6 rating and user reviews praising the episode's focus on Chopper, the animation quality, and the emotional weight of his decision to use Monster Point. Reviewers noted the episode's surprising maturity and strong character development tying back to Drum Island.
spoilerScope: Episode 290 and general Enies Lobby arc

title: Episode 290 - One Piece Wiki
author: One Piece Wiki contributors
description: Comprehensive wiki article covering Episode 290 including plot summary, character appearances, animation credits, trivia, and connections to manga chapters 406-407. Includes information about Monster Point's debut and the episode's place in the Enies Lobby arc.

title: 290-93: Uncontrollable! Chopper's Forbidden Rumble!
author: neverwatchedonepiece
description: Detailed blog post reaction to Episode 290 describing Chopper becoming 'the Hulk of One Piece' and analyzing the Monster Point transformation. The post describes the transformation in vivid detail and discusses Kumadori's defeat.

title: Kumadori - One Piece Wiki
author: One Piece Wiki contributors
description: Character wiki page for Kumadori with comprehensive information about his abilities, Seimei Kikan techniques, Doriki power level (810), personality, background, and role in the Enies Lobby arc. Includes details about his fight with Chopper in Episode 290.

title: Seimei Kikan - One Piece Wiki
author: One Piece Wiki contributors
description: Wiki article explaining Seimei Kikan (Life Return) technique, its mechanics, users, and specific applications. Details Kumadori's use of the technique for hair manipulation and weight control as demonstrated in Episode 290.

title: Chopper's Best One Piece Episodes, Ranked
author: CBR Staff
description: Article ranking Chopper's best episodes throughout One Piece, with Episode 290 and the Monster Point debut featured prominently. Discusses the significance of this transformation in Chopper's character development and its impact on the Enies Lobby arc.

title: One Piece: Chopper's Devil Fruit Awakening Will Make Him an 'Angel'
author: FandomWire Staff
description: Theory article discussing potential future awakening of Chopper's Devil Fruit, connecting Monster Point from Episode 290 to theories about true awakening. Proposes that Chopper's awakening will grant healing abilities and an angelic form contrasting with Robin's demonic powers.

title: Hito Hito no Mi - One Piece Wiki
author: One Piece Wiki contributors
description: Comprehensive wiki article about the Hito Hito no Mi (Human-Human Fruit), including its abilities, Chopper's various forms, Rumble Ball mechanics, and detailed explanation of Monster Point. Discusses the forbidden nature of the third Rumble Ball and its consequences.
spoilerScope: Entire series including devil fruit mechanics

title: Tony Tony Chopper/Abilities and Powers - One Piece Wiki
author: One Piece Wiki contributors
description: Detailed breakdown of all Chopper's abilities and transformations, with extensive coverage of Monster Point's debut in Episode 290, its mechanics, and how it evolved after the timeskip. Includes analysis of the Rumble Ball system.
spoilerScope: Entire series showing Chopper's power progression

title: Enies Lobby Arc - One Piece Wiki
author: One Piece Wiki contributors
description: Complete arc guide for the Enies Lobby arc, providing context for Episode 290's place within the larger story. Covers the Tower of Justice battles, CP9 confrontations, and the mission to rescue Robin.
spoilerScope: Entire Enies Lobby and Water 7 Saga

title: One Piece: This Chopper Power Should Return
author: GameRant Staff
description: Article discussing fan desires for the return of Chopper's terrifying, uncontrolled Monster Point from Episode 290. Analyzes how the transformation has changed post-timeskip and argues for the return of its original frightening nature.

title: 'One Piece' Needs to Give Chopper an Upgrade
author: FandomWire Staff
description: Opinion piece discussing how Chopper needs a significant power upgrade, referencing Monster Point from Episode 290 as an example of his potential. Compares his power progression to other Straw Hats.

title: Rumble Ball - One Piece Wiki
author: One Piece Wiki contributors
description: Wiki article explaining the Rumble Ball drug created by Chopper, its effects on Devil Fruit transformations, and the dangerous consequences of taking three within six hours. Essential background for understanding Episode 290's Monster Point transformation.

title: One Piece Episode 290 Discussion
author: Multiple forum users
description: Forum discussion thread where fans discuss and react to Episode 290, sharing their thoughts on Monster Point's debut and Chopper's sacrifice to save Robin.

title: One Piece: All Members Of The CP9, Ranked By Strength
author: GameRant Staff
description: Article ranking all CP9 members by strength, including Kumadori with his Doriki of 810. Provides context for the difficulty of Chopper's battle in Episode 290 and why Monster Point was necessary.

title: Crazy Rainbow - One Piece Wiki
author: One Piece Wiki contributors
description: Wiki article about the eighth One Piece opening theme 'Crazy Rainbow' by Tackey & Tsubasa, used for episodes 284-325 including Episode 290. Includes trivia about the singers being animated into Episode 303.

title: One Piece: Monster Point Chopper and Perospero CRT
author: Multiple forum users
description: Power scaling discussion analyzing Monster Point Chopper's strength and comparing it across different arcs. References Episode 290 as the debut of this transformation.
